kw.name: Copy List
kw.doc: Returns a copy of the given list.
kw.msg: @{unsorted} = [ Blouse | Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts | Printed Chiffon Dress | Printed Dress | Printed Dress | Printed Summer Dress | Printed Summer Dress ]

kw.name: Sort List
kw.doc: Sorts the given list in place.

kw.name: Lists Should Be Equal

kw.msg: Lists are different: Index 0: Printed Summer Dress != Blouse Index 1: Printed Summer Dress != Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts Index 2: Printed Dress != Printed Chiffon Dress Index 4: Printed Chiffon Dress != Printed Dress Index 5: Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts != Printed Summer Dress Index 6: Blouse != Printed Summer Dress

kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on current page.

kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
